Uses of Class
com.okta.authn.sdk.AuthenticationException

  • Packages that use AuthenticationException 
    Package Description
    com.okta.authn.sdk  
    com.okta.authn.sdk.client  
    com.okta.authn.sdk.impl.client  

    • Uses of AuthenticationException in com.okta.authn.sdk

      Subclasses of AuthenticationException in com.okta.authn.sdk 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AuthenticationFailureException
      Authentication/login attempt failure.
      class  CredentialsException
      Update of user credentials failed.
      class  FactorValidationException
      MFA Factor validation failed.
      class  InvalidAuthenticationStateException
      Operation not allowed from the current authentication state.
      class  InvalidRecoveryAnswerException
      Invalid recovery question answer.
      class  InvalidTokenException
      Invalid token provided.
      class  InvalidUserException
      Recovery or other state is not allowed for user.
      class  UserLockedException
      Factor user locked exception.
